QuestData.Title: The Torches
QuestData.Description: Until recently, the yaungol shaman would come here to work alongside us. Now, they bend my people to their will.$b$bIf we refuse, they kill us. Even if we oblige... they kill us.$b$bThe yaungol mist-shaman's magic flows through his torch. Take his torch away, and he has nothing.
QuestData.CompletionText: I can use these torches in my revenge.$b$bI have not succumbed to this wound yet. I can still have my revenge before I die.$b$bThere is time yet.
QuestData.RewardText: This torch... the yaungol once used these to communicate with me, with my people.$b$bNow, they use them to undo us.
